title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat eggs in a bowl, then mix in cheese and pepper.
Drain spaghetti, then mix with pancetta.
Add egg mixture and toss quickly to create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Saute onions, then add tomato puree and spices.
Stir in cream and add grilled chicken.
